name: HELLAS-CRISIS
description:
HELLAS-CRISIS

Where are there still real challenges in these days, where have they gone ?

You might already have found one of these major challenges !

One of those people who can free the country from the financial public debt.

If you are really willing to give everything, you can do it !

But do not be too hasty, you have to be cautious.

Of course, they all want only your best, your cash !

Be on your guard and good luck my noble philanthropist !

The basic idea of the game was to provide a better understanding of the financial crisis in Europe in a fun way.
Since this topic is just too complex and therefore very difficult to understand.
The aim of the game is, using the example of Greece, the country rid of its financial public debts. This can be a difficult task, but doable.
The game is an endless game, Improvement proposals and suggestions are gladly accepted gratefully, wish you much fun with the game !
